<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Yamatsumi (The Mountain Lord)](/Deities.aspx?ID=185)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Tian Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=16)

**Edicts** Strive to be self-sufficient, respect nature, test yourself against the elements

**Anathema** Become reliant on civilization, destroy something without creating or growing something in its place

**Follower Alignments**
LN, NG, N, CN

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

**Favored Weapon** [Greatclub](/Weapons.aspx?ID=22)

**Domains** [Cold](/Domains.aspx?ID=41), [Earth](/Domains.aspx?ID=10), [Fire](/Domains.aspx?ID=13), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=20)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Shockwave](/Spells.aspx?ID=587)

- **3rd**
[Shifting Sand](/Spells.aspx?ID=586)

- **7th**
[Volcanic Eruption](/Spells.aspx?ID=360)

</column>
name: Yamatsumi (The Mountain Lord)
